Name: assign_team_to_project
Description: 1 if team t is assigned to project p else 0

Name: select_feature_for_sprint
Description: 1 if feature f is selected for current sprint else 0

Name: allocate_worker_to_story
Description: 1 if worker w is allocated to user story s else 0

Name: set_task_in_progress
Description: 1 if task is set to in_progress else 0

Name: budget_allocation_project
Description: Amount of budget allocated to a project

Name: max_parallel_tasks_per_worker
Description: Cap on parallel tasks per worker

Name: max_cards_on_scrum_board
Description: Upper limit of cards allowed on board
